Package com.rti.dds.example.file

Implements FileReplicator Publisher and Subscriber applications.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BlockingQueue This class provides queue functionality.
FileReconstructor This class reconstructs a file from FileSegment objects.
FileSegmenter This class finds files to be send over DDS and prepares messages to represent those files.
FileSegmenter.FileSegmenterFilenameFilter This class provides a filter for filenames.
FileSegmentPublisher FileSegmentPublisher establishes entities required to read, segment and transmit files from the base directory.
FileSegmentPublisher.Opt FileSegmentPublisher command-line options.
FileSegmentSubscriber FileSegmentSubscriber establishes entities to receive and reconstruct FileSegments and write them to disk.
FileSegmentSubscriber.Opt FileSegmentSubscriber command-line options.
FileSegmentWriteThread This class takes data samples from the queue and writes them to DDS.
ReaderTrackingWriterListener ReaderTrackingWriterListener handles on_publication_matched callbacks and takes appropriate measures when readers leave or join.
 

Package com.rti.dds.example.file Description

Implements FileReplicator Publisher and Subscriber applications.
